4.1.1.1.8. src.IOT_GUI_UtilitiesDock module¶

-- coding: utf-8 --

File: IOT_GUI_UtilitiesDock.py

Class IOT_GUI_UtilitiesDock

A dockable panel for tools and utilities. It provides a tabbed set of panels for selecting scan within a volume or reporting layer thicknesses among others.

IOT stands for INAOE OCT Tools

Log:
Date Author Description
12-Dec-2018 FOE
  • Class created.
